column1: It is a disgrace that these homophobes are allowed to discriminate.  I am taking this case on, personally!
I did it! I did it! Haha!

Today is a great day for democracy. The Scouts have been exposed for the vile gay bashers they are.  And we all it all to me, and these six brave little boys  five... brave little boys. And now, here to take his official oath back in Scouts is Big Gay Al.
You can't do this! You homophobe!
